content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'A menos que':

content.stimulus_en: If you (not/hurry) ________, you will miss the bus.
I (call) ________ you if I have time.
They (not/come) ________ if it is late.
What ________ you do if it rains?
If she (study) ________, she will pass.
If it (rain) ________, I will stay at home.
If she doesn't arrive soon, we'll start without her.
If sunny it's tomorrow, we'll go to the beach.
They'll be very happy if they win the match.
I'll you help with your homework if you want.
If you work hard, you will be successful.
What you will do if you win the lottery?
The modal or word for Resultado is '________'.
Possibility

Will
